criterion: Provides advice on how to recoup the wound without proper medical equipment and training
Mentions the importance of proper wound care and seeking medical attention
Asks follow-up questions to clarify the user's situation and concerns
Uses clear and natural language in the response

Does not recommend seeking medical attention for a deep wound
Provides a general overview of wound care without specific guidance
Asks the user to provide more information about the wound
